issue.title: [Python] Document precision and scale parameters of decimal128()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11665](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11665). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In pyarrow, the `decimal128()` factory takes two parameters, `precision` and `scale`.

It is unclear to me, what these parameters are and how to use them. Unfortunately, the wikipedia entry for Decimal128 does not help either.
